name: Death by Bees
description:
Death by Bees is a short game about the dangers of beekeeping. Shoot the little black and yellow demons with your tranquilizer darts, but be careful-They will swarm!

This is my first PICO-8 game. I made it to learn how to use PICO-8, and it turned out to be really fun!

I once got stung by a bee. This is my revenge.
